Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y cells stably expressing DMT1 (with or without wild-type or mutant A53T -Synuclein) were used.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased Fe²⁺ uptake, cell death, oxidative stress, and DNA damage
Readout description.Result Description: Mutant A53T -Synuclein increased Fe²⁺ uptake and cell death compared to wild-type or control cells. Pharmacological inhibition of autophagy reversed cell death.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly described in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cells or empty vector controls were used implicitly.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells without DMT1 or mutant A53T -Synuclein were used as controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No explicit threshold described; standard viability thresholds (e.g., >80% cell viability) assumed.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: No explicit threshold described; standard thresholds (e.g., <50% cell viability) assumed.
